products.name: Classic White T-Shirt
products.description: A timeless wardrobe staple, the Classic White T-Shirt is crafted from premium cotton for a soft and comfortable feel. This versatile piece is perfect for casual days and can be paired with jeans or shorts. Available in sizes S, M, L, and XL. Color: White. Rating: 4.5.

products.name: Slim Fit Blue Jeans
products.description: Achieve a modern and sleek look with our Slim Fit Blue Jeans. Made from high-quality denim, these jeans offer both style and comfort. The slim fit design complements various outfits. Available in sizes 28, 30, 32, and 34. Color: Blue. Rating: 4.2.

products.name: Hooded Grey Sweatshirt
products.description: Stay warm and stylish with our Hooded Grey Sweatshirt. Crafted from a blend of cotton and polyester, this sweatshirt provides comfort and durability. The hood adds an extra layer of coziness. Available in sizes S, M, L, and XL. Color: Grey. Rating: 4.0.

products.name: Leather Jacket
products.description: Make a bold statement with our Leather Jacket. This jacket is made from genuine leather and features a classic design. Ideal for adding a touch of edge to your outfit. Available in sizes S, M, L, and XL. Color: Black. Rating: 4.8.

products.name: Graphic Print T-Shirt
products.description: Express your unique style with our Graphic Print T-Shirt. The eye-catching design adds a playful touch to your wardrobe. Made from soft cotton for comfort. Available in sizes S, M, L, and XL. Color: Various prints. Rating: 4.6.

products.name: Straight Leg Black Jeans
products.description: Embrace a sleek and modern look with our Straight Leg Black Jeans. The timeless black color and straight leg cut make these jeans versatile for various occasions. Available in sizes 28, 30, 32, and 34. Color: Black. Rating: 4.4.

products.name: Quarter-Zip Sweatshirt
products.description: Elevate your casual style with our Quarter-Zip Sweatshirt. The quarter-zip design adds a contemporary touch, and the sweatshirt is crafted for both comfort and style. Available in sizes S, M, L, and XL. Color: Various colors. Rating: 4.2.

products.name: Bomber Jacket
products.description: Stay on-trend with our Bomber Jacket. This jacket features a classic bomber style with a zip front and ribbed cuffs. Perfect for adding a cool and casual vibe to your look. Available in sizes S, M, L, and XL. Color: Olive. Rating: 4.7.

products.name: Striped Polo T-Shirt
products.description: Upgrade your casual wardrobe with our Striped Polo T-Shirt. The classic polo design is enhanced with stylish stripes for a polished look. Made from breathable fabric for all-day comfort. Available in sizes S, M, L, and XL. Color: Navy/White. Rating: 4.3.

products.name: Ripped Skinny Jeans
products.description: Make a bold statement with our Ripped Skinny Jeans. The distressed details and skinny fit create an edgy and fashionable look. Crafted from high-quality denim for durability. Available in sizes 28, 30, 32, and 34. Color: Blue. Rating: 4.5.
